subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: George Hincapie has signed a two-year contract with T-Mobile. Hincapie, a 34-year-old American, helped Lance Armstrong win all of his record seven Tour de France victories between 1999 and 2005.
snippet: George Hincapie has signed a two-year contract with T-Mobile. Hincapie, a 34-year-old American, helped Lance Armstrong win all of his record seven Tour de France victories between 1999 and 2005.
